topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ee80bc6368725d18410200#post_54ee80bc6368725d18410200
I'm not sure about paralysis, but the biggest worry after a brown recluse bite is necrosis. The venom basically kills the surrounding tissue and causes it to rot while it's still attached. And the rotting flesh just continues and continues until you eventually die from it.
